channel.title: Black Mesa recent download from Steam
channel.description: I bought BM right after it was offered for sale on Steam. I had downloaded the mod when it first came out as well after waiting patiently for quite a while. The original mod was great, the paid version was better but..... I recently had to reinstall Steam and all my games including BM. I just played it again from the beginning and I just have to say I am impressed with all the new improvements to even the original "for sale" version. The graphics are better, the voice acting is better and just overall a huge improvement over the game that was on my machine. I can't wait for the Zen portion to be finished. I just had to post and tell the developers what a great job they have done. Bravo Zulu.

item.title: Black Mesa recent download from Steam
item.dc:creator: jpk
item.description:
I bought BM right after it was offered for sale on Steam. I had downloaded the mod when it first came out as well after waiting patiently for quite a while. The original mod was great, the paid version was better but… I recently had to reinstall Steam and all my games including BM. I just played it again from the beginning and I just have to say I am impressed with all the new improvements to even the original “for sale” version. The graphics are better, the voice acting is better and just overall a huge improvement over the game that was on my machine. I can’t wait for the Zen portion to be finished. I just had to post and tell the developers what a great job they have done. Bravo Zulu.
